caption.p: Study schedule of enrollment, intervention, and assessment. Abbreviations: G-CSF, granulocyte colony stimulating factor; AUDIT-K, Alchol Use Disorder Identification Test-Korea; USG, ultrasonography; CT, computed tomography; MRI, magnetic resonance imaging; CTP, Child–Turcotte–Pugh, MELD, model for end-stage liver disease; CLIF-SOFA, chronic liver failure sequential organ failure assessment; D, day
